MAIN_MESSAGE: There is power cut in the TD3, TD5 and TD10 postcode areas of Gordon, Kelso and Duns. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:56pm. Our control centre has managed to remotely restore power to some customers and our emergency response team are on their way to the Gordon primary substation. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:20pm on Saturday, 12 December 2020
